name: improved-toolkit
description: **Komyut** provides a CLI-based toolkit for developers to design jeepney routes, generate Route Packs, and compile route caches — essential for powering Komyut’s backend routing engine.

scripts.bundle:routebuilder: npm run build-ts && pkg dist/routebuilder/index.js --output bin/routebuilder.exe --targets node18-win-x64
scripts.bundle:routecalc: npm run build-ts && pkg dist/routecalc/index.js --output bin/routecalc.exe --targets node18-win-x64
